name: papermerge
description: [{{ project_name|capitalize }}]({{ project_url }}) is an open source document management system (DMS) primarily designed for archiving and retrieving your digital documents. Instead of having piles of paper documents all over your desk, office or drawers - you can quickly scan them and configure your scanner to directly upload to Papermerge DMS."

env.description: Specify a timezone to use EG America/New_York

Specify an external redis instance to use. Can optionally include a port (`redis:6379`) and/or db (`redis/foo`). If left blank or not included, will use a built-in redis instance. If changed after initial setup will also require manual modification of /config/settings.py

volumes.description: Storage location for all papermerge data files.

readme-vars.project_blurb: [{{ project_name|capitalize }}]({{ project_url }}) is an open source document management system (DMS) primarily designed for archiving and retrieving your digital documents. Instead of having piles of paper documents all over your desk, office or drawers - you can quickly scan them and configure your scanner to directly upload to Papermerge DMS."

param_volumes.desc: Storage location for all papermerge data files.

param_env_vars.desc: Specify a timezone to use EG America/New_York

opt_param_env_vars.desc: Specify an external redis instance to use. Can optionally include a port (`redis:6379`) and/or db (`redis/foo`). If left blank or not included, will use a built-in redis instance. If changed after initial setup will also require manual modification of /config/settings.py

readme-vars.app_setup_block:
Default login is admin:admin via the webui, accessible at http://SERVERIP:PORT
More info at [papermerge]({{ project_url }}).

If you need non-English OCR language support, you can use [this mod](https://github.com/linuxserver/docker-mods/tree/papermerge-multilangocr).

setup:
Default login is admin:admin via the webui, accessible at http://SERVERIP:PORT
More info at [papermerge]({{ project_url }}).

If you need non-English OCR language support, you can use [this mod](https://github.com/linuxserver/docker-mods/tree/papermerge-multilangocr).
title: Papermerge
